description: Stage 999 (SEAL): Final stage where constitutional verdicts are sealed and logged to immutable Cooling Ledger. Contains ZKPC protocol specs, Phoenix-72 amendment protocol, and archive of constitutional evolution.

zkpc_protocol.description: Zero-Knowledge Proof Chain protocol for constitutional witness verification
zkpc_protocol.purpose: Cryptographic proof chains for multi-agent constitutional compliance verification

cooling_ledger.description: Immutable ledger specification for constitutional verdict logging
cooling_ledger.purpose: Append-only log of all constitutional checkpoints with cryptographic hashing

phoenix_72.description: 72-hour cooling protocol for L1 Canon amendments (SABAR-72)
phoenix_72.purpose: Constitutional amendment governance - prevents hasty changes to fundamental law

entropy_dump.description: Entropy Dump policy for VOID verdict routing and compaction
entropy_dump.purpose: Defines VOID routing, 24h retention, and isolation policies for failed constitutional attempts

archive.purpose: Preserves constitutional history for forensic analysis and learning

stage_999_purpose.description: Stage 999 is the final stage in the 000-999 pipeline where constitutional work is SEALED
operations: Log verdict to Cooling Ledger (immutable append)
Generate cryptographic hash of session artifacts
Archive constitutional decisions for audit trail
Trigger Phoenix-72 protocol if L1 Canon changes proposed
Handoff to next session with sealed context
stage_999_purpose.seal_requirement: All floors F1-F12 must pass before reaching 999. If any floor fails, pipeline stops at failure stage.

cooling_ledger_integration.hash_chain: Each ledger entry contains SHA-256 of previous entry for tamper detection

phoenix_72_integration.description: If any session proposes changes to L1_THEORY/canon/, Phoenix-72 protocol is triggered
protocol_steps: 1. Proposed change is written to L1_THEORY/phoenix_72/proposed/
4. If consensus reached after 72h, proposal moves to L1_THEORY/phoenix_72/approved/
5. If rejected, proposal archived in L1_THEORY/phoenix_72/rejected/
6. Approved changes are forged into canon with git seal
phoenix_72_integration.rationale: Prevents AI from unilaterally rewriting constitutional law. Cooling period allows reflection and multi-stakeholder review.

archive_policy.description: Vault 999 preserves deprecated specifications for forensic analysis
archive_policy.format: Original JSON files with SUNSET metadata
archive_policy.access: Read-only for audit and learning purposes

meta.author: arifOS Project - Track B v46 Restructure
meta.notes: Vault 999 is the constitutional memory layer. Unlike active floors (F1-F12), this is archival and governance protocol layer. ZKPC, Cooling Ledger, and Phoenix-72 specs to be implemented in subsequent phases.
